snippet.title: Samba de Amigo Ver. 2000 [Dreamcast] by SEGA - Saturn Medley [HD] [1080p60]
snippet.description:
Samba de Amigo Ver. 2000 (サンバ DE アミーゴ　Ver.2000) is an enhanced version of the original Sonic Team rhythm game for the Dreamcast.

Time Code:

0:29 "Let's Go Away" (Daytona USA)
2:27 "Dreams Dreams" (NiGHTS into Dreams)
4:24 "Angels with Burning Hearts" (Burning Rangers)
6:19 "We Are Burning Rangers" (Burning Rangers)
8:02 "Super Sonic Racing" (Sonic R)

Buy It Now!

➣ eBay - http://goo.gl/4RJiX2
➣ Play Asia - http://goo.gl/jQC8EX
➣ Amazon - http://goo.gl/gzfp8T
➣ GameStop - http://bit.ly/2CIXPZ9

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enjoy the video? Remember to like, comment, and subscribe!

➣ Steam - http://goo.gl/jYV4pz

(セガゲームス, 세가 게임즈, 世嘉) | Sega Enterprises (セガ・エンタープライゼス) | Sonic Team (ソニックチーム, 소닉 팀, 索尼克小组) | #SonicTeam | Dreamcast (ドリームキャスト, 드림캐스트, 传播梦想) | [DC] | #Dreamcast | Music Game (音楽ゲーム, 음악 게임, 音樂遊戲) | Rhythm Game (リズムアクション, 리듬 게임인, 节奏游戏) | Sega Saturn (セガサターン, 세가 새턴, 世嘉土星) | [SS] | #SegaSaturn | Daytona USA (デイトナUSA, 데이토나 USA, 梦游美国) | NiGHTS into Dreams (ナイツ, 나이츠 인투 드림즈, 飛天幽夢) | Burning Rangers (バーニングレンジャー, 버닝레인저, 救火奇兵) | Sonic R (ソニックR, 소닉 R, 索尼克R) | Gameplay | Walkthrough, Guide | Emulator (エミュレータ, 에뮬레이터, 游戏机模拟器) | DEmul 0.7a | High-definition (高精細, 고선명, 高解析) | HD | 1080p | 60 FPS
